lines.text: I mean, I think I would look pretty good in an apron.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think you would look fantastic in an apron, especially if you weren't wearing anything under it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, that's the only way you wear an apron.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I couldn't agree more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I basically want to be your Yeza, you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm here to support you like you support me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes I wonder if I just want to leave that in the past, but I kind of want to drop this book off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I am so excited to explore every bit of you in multiple layers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But if you'll have me, I mean, there's still a lot of Xhorhas that I'd like to see.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will have you and then some.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe we should take a little journey to Xhorhas, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Well, they've got like two weeks of paperwork that they've got to file at the Cobalt Reserve at this point. They don't really need me right now, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot of bureaucracy in the meantime, and they know that that's not my strong suit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to get close, one of the sentinels on horseback, spear at the ready, shield at the side rides up and shouts, "Who goes there?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with a look of recognition turns around and rides back, shouting, "Orphan Maker! The Orphan Maker!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know if this is a good thing that they'd recognize me, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just grip my staff just a little bit, just in case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this about to get real fun?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Boy, oh boy, I wasn't quite expecting this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Go with me on this, all right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to kneel and I'm going to bamf out my wings.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just want to know where you buried her, and I will leave you alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say with advantage, because that lighting bolt was fucking intimidating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing was left to mark it."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you for giving her a proper burial.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, "I wish things weren't the way they were." "Then you will let this Skyspear live, at least?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then go, and don't come back." She turns and slowly, one by one, the other soldiers begin to turn their horses and cautiously return to their encampment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, did you murder the leader of your tribe?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, that's kind of how it goes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck, why aren't you the new Skyspear?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty strict, which, I was super into it back then, but things are quite different now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shall we go see if we can find an unmarked grave?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you for keeping us safe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think you have more influence than you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you to make an investigation check, I would like you to make a religion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know this is the grave of Zuala.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm talking to her like she's here, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And yet I'm still eternally grateful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But all I wanted to say was I'm sorry, (sniffles) and I love you very much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's time to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still have some of those seeds that Caduceus gave you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps) Yes! Oh, what a great idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: See, this is why it's great to have you around, you have good ideas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shall we take the scenic route?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a lot of the same, but you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We walk off into the Xhorhasian sunset.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester, just saw a sea turtle the size of a horse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I miss you guys so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, tell her, wait, can we talk back to her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, you might-- if you get close to my face maybe she can hear you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, I miss you, love you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give Fjord a big kiss, okay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come back soon, we'll hang out, and go do stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything else further you would like to pursue, or are you happy to leave it on the family--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to do our thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, is there anything else you would like to--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: and absconded from the Aeorian trade post.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He went there to continue his business for the time being, because at least it was far away, and there were people there that relied on him, but even that he eventually left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, hopefully I could meet him there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I think if he would deign to go with me and do that, eventually I would also wind our way back to that chamber, the T-dock chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bonding experience, a trying experience, but that friendship and connection is forged even stronger with that process until eventually you both return to the Genesis Ward, and eventually the T-dock experimentation chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this still something that you consider?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as much as they hurt me, I don't want to change a thing."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And in a little less than two decades, start coming to this square once a week, every week, and eventually you will find me there." Of course, it would work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Will you do it? Will you do it? I will help you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (long soft sigh) I drag some dust up my arm, and disintegrate everything in the room, and burn what's left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he appreciates the time he has with you, and the friendship beyond that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think he will teach Luc, if his parents will have me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I had thought about possibly opening some sort of a little summer camp to teach young adventurers how to stealth, and sneak, and fire crossbows, and maybe learn a little magic, so if you'd like to come and be a counselor. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will teach transmutation, and try to instill a sense of stewardship, and the responsibility that comes with power to my students, and do my damnedest to be sure that there is none of what happened to my friends and I in school happening now, and probably push the envelope on treason in this country, let's be honest, but.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, what do you do with that Cloven Crystal you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or at least what's your intent with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not going to let it out of my sight just yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eventually, though, Fjord, we have to take care of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I'm probably going to drop it off with someone like the Cobalt Soul or something, but I just thought, you know, we should at least be able to give a detailed report of where the third key hole is to give a detailed report of where the third key hole is you know, just so that more powerful parties than us ever you know, like the whole picture, just to remove all the mystery of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then, you know, put it to rest, get rid of the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you saying we should go to the third temple?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, that's what responsible, you know, chosen of demigod should do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right? Just from afar, with a (clicks).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, is there anything you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then one day, we're attacked on the open sea, and suddenly you have two ships.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And one month later, we vanish in the middle of the night and head straight to Darktow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Except, of course, for the fact that I've never giving back the ship, (laughter) and I make my way to join the Revelry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who knows how well it'll go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (tearfully) I love you guys so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks for a good story, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (inhales and exhales) We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
